title: No One Said Anything About Dragons!
description: After being adopted by a beautiful sorceress, BA’AL imagined that all of his troubles would be over. But after she breaks members of his new fellowship out of the Bastille and a Witch hunter shoots him with a poisoned crossbow bolt, he comes to the conclusion that his life is not going to follow the trajectory of any of the great tales.  Now, after encounters with fel-beasts, masked assassins, Dark Elves, evil adventurers and enormous poisonous insects, BA’AL can only imagine what fate will shoot at him next.
author: J.L. Lahey
